original_text: Do not become united with people who do not believe in Christ. God has made you right with himself. Right and wrong cannot work together. Light and dark cannot join together.
korean_text: 너희는 믿지 않는 자와 멍에를 함께 메지 말라 의와 불법이 어찌 함께 하며 빛과 어둠이 어찌 사귀며

sentences.original_text: Do not become united with people who do not believe in Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도를 믿지 않는 사람들과 연합하지 말라

sentences.original_text: God has made you right with himself
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 너희를 자신과 옳은 관계로 만드셨다

sentences.original_text: Right and wrong cannot work together
sentences.korean_translation: 의와 불의가 함께 일할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: Light and dark cannot join together
